bow: what do you wish you received at your baby shower removed love the boppy newborn lounger it one of the things we ve used everyday kind of wish received some self care gifts we got lovely things for the baby but didn end up feeling very well taken care of after the birth the boring stuff off my registry that no one wants to buy because it isn cute the nice sound machine diaper sprayer closet drawer organizers alternatively you could look at her registry and get bunch of the cheaper useful stuff nipple shields amp salve bath thermometer nail clippers drying rack etc and make big basket of it all wish gotten some clothes in other sizes had more month clothes than my baby ever even wore then when he turned months old had almost nothing should have registered for few month and 12 like pack of onesies of each or something we did have to buy wipes for almost months we also had diapers in various sizes so we never had to rush out and buy larger size when we realized she outgrew the smaller ones overnight diapers and wipes are exciting to buy but they are so freaking nice also if you know their feeding plans formula it so expensive we had wic and it was still strain sometimes if you re going for the parent stuff gift certificate without an expiration date for restaurant and if you re close enough offer to babysit the night they use it it might take while to use but it will be nice for them nice bath bombs lotions candles for mom so grateful for everyone giving other people month clothes we had enough barely worn hand me downs to dress twins yes to the boppy lounger buy that for all my new mama friends someone gifted me mommy care package that loved it had tumbler nursing pads nursing balm dermoplast blue can tucks pads regular pads and chapstick used all of it after delivery vote registry stuff too practical gifts are the best gifts in my opinion boppy hakaa milk savers if breastfeeding baby grooming kit it has baby nail clippers comb and brush etc diapers of their preferred kind wipes baby shampoo basically skip the adorable clothing toys and get practical things she going to need to care for the baby that what she ll be using the most those tutus are gon na sit in drawer wipe warmer newborns fuss and cry lot less at changing if the wipes are warm also white noise machine it masks the noises around them so they are not as likely to be woken by random house noise it also helps queue them for sleep if you need them to sleep anywhere during trip the best baby shower gift received was actually gifts that now combine as my go to shower gift the first was diaper bag loaded with all kinds of goodies diapers wipes bottles extra nipples burp cloths cloth diapers make the best burp cloths an outfit or pacifiers diaper rash cream lotion hand sanitizer blanket small toys books etc the second was small gift set of burts bees stuff for me and note ve upgrade from burts bees to shampoo and conditioner bar set from naples soap company but the sentiment is the same always include gift that just for mom like giving basket of goodies for moms or dads who are up in the middle of the night feeding the baby granola bars mini water bottles fruit leather beef jerky etc was always starving for those middle of the night feedings double rainbow maker by kikkerland definitely clothes in larger sizes but also be mindful of seasonality some people gave me winter stuff in 12 month sizes for my april baby obviously all babies grow differently but that stuff got exchanged also have and like to give the infantino textured multi ball set you can play with babies lot sooner than many people think and this is great way to expose baby to textures as simple as running the ball over the babies feet and legs and describing the texture and color my almost two year old still plays with them do forget book my go to is baby goes beep white noise machine hatch baby rest specifically buy some practical stuff for the baby clothes are nice but we had soooo much she did get to wear it all so wipes diapers thermometer baththermometer bath bath stand changing pillow grooming kit and you can never have enough spit cloths do know if it is the correct english term but those absorbing fabric cloths for throw up etc an aerosleep matress cover is also great gift if the baby turns on its stomach it can still breath and please do not forget mama make her feel special too bathstuff lotions facemasks etc buy off the registry don buy clothes amazon gift cards boring stuff diapers wipes washcloths last thing want to get blankets think received also baby clothes for much older babies had too much clothes for the start but not enough later on consideration what needed was for someone to listen to me and get the items on the registry not for everyone to lose their mind that requested no pink yes to this after came home from the hospital my child free friends surprised me with things just for me candle chocolate nice nursing nightgown nursing tank sheet masks nail polish at weeks out haven been able to use the masks and nail polish yet but they are there waiting for when have few free hours the rest could use immediately was really touched one friend took me for pedicure during week 37 little did we know go into labor just few days later that pedi is little chipped but still going strong good for you for asking 12 18 month clothes toddler shoes size basket of food like apricots crackers cheeses for me this reminds me about week after the birth some friends brought us basket with nice coffee trail mix and chocolate definitely came in handy when we were still sleeping in shifts up all night and needing snacks we could eat with one hand it depends did get lot of clothing at my baby registry but lucky enough not to have needed to rely on the shower for things that really wanted how much do you want to spend my mommy must haves that tell all ftm they need halo sleep sacks halo bassinet fisher price sit me up floor seat so much better than the bumbo and cheap nice white noise machine buy off her registry gift cards toward her stroller system carseat amazon prime gift cards wipes diapers boppy or breastfriend like others have said the registry is really the best place to buy things she probably wo need blankets swaddles clothing in newborn or especially if it girl haakaa nipple butters nice bath robe clothes for nursing baby washclothes baby clothes in bigger sizes with zippers anything on my baby shower list it took me such long time to research the things added luckily got everything from there guess what didn use everything got that was not on my list this would have been so nice all asked for from my best friend was bottle of wine she brought me non alcoholic wine after birth actually just threw it away yesterday because it went bad luckily my aunt brought me couple bottles to celebrate lol agree with the noise machine the wipe warmer to me is waste of money get her stuff she can use when the baby is 12 months got so many clothes for newborn and months my daughter didn even get to wear all of them bouncer play mat diapers bibs eating utensils any kind of toy the company tech has lot of cool toys that teach kids things you seriously can go wrong with diapers but if she registered for diapers please get the brand she registered for people got me different brands but specifically registered for the brand chose for reason other than that get boring stuff it won be cute but it ll be what she needs baby monitors bath seat shampoo and soap socks just plain white ones that fold over are the best for everything seriously go boring she ll thank you yes we have mountain of baby blankets crocheted blankets quilts and swaddle blankets and honestly lot of it will probably get regifted know they were made with love but there only so much you can do with 20 ×3 blankets stuff off my registry especially the boring stuff knew would listen so just returned most of the obnoxiously pink stuff for other nonpink stuff psa if you have the awesome idea of buying clothes in larger sizes make sure it makes sense for the season ex got winter clothes in sizes she ll most likely be in summer my daughter literally wore only onesie for the first six weeks of her life so concur about the clothes agreed got somewhere around 12 swaddling blankets other baby blankets had crocheted ones from my childhood another my grandma made for my baby and then my mil wanted to get me another please no we live in the south it only cold like months we registered for sizes up to 12 and got almost nothing in in fact we did have more than newborn onesies we all thought he be bigger than he was the nerve we had to buy so much after our shower because very few people stuck to the registry so just do that and second the little stuff like baby acetaminophen thermometer nail file cradle cap brush etc the seasons are so important for clothes my daughter was born in summer in city that gets really hot but some people gave us long sleeved newborn clothes they were never used did not tell anyone the gender for this reason just bought the fp floor seat love it go practical and go off her list things wish would have gotten were sheets teethers breast feeding supplies and other baby feeding supplies and toys did get any toys simple ones like lame freddy the firefly and bright starts snuggle teether are amazing buy from the registry your friend most likely put lot of time and thought into picking out the exact items she wanted and then if you want to throw in couple cute outfits or books on top of registry gift that okay always registry look here list of exactly what need nope 10 pink shirts alright then the baby swing did get one register for one because did know how great it would be and my baby did nap for the first months of life until borrowed one from friend now he naps in it every day like sweet angel this comment might be little different from others but will always remember what my best friend basically sister got me for my shower she did get me anything off my registry the other people at the shower did she made me basket with gifts that were meaningful to our friendship she knitted blanket got shirts and bibs that we knew the references for she gave me kid book that used to be her own so maybe it was exactly practical but it was so us ouch someone missed the memo… omg want the dohm white noise machine so bad use one at work and kind of want to snatch it for myself nanny another vote for stuff of the registry from me why does everything have to be pink there are so many colors out there and it all just pink have bad habit of leaving the diaper bag in the car overnight wipes will freeze at least try to shake the ice off before using them clothes for nursing is great idea if you know your friends style even just couple of basic tanks and tees can go long way in the early days haven seen my go to shower gift suggested yet buy her the fancy thermometer she registered for along with some infant tylenol and advil acetaminophen and ibuprofen get the dye free because she first time mom and those things matter depending on my price range for the new mom fill out the gift with the hydra sense nasal aspirator kit saline boogie wipes natural diaper cream and zinc based one give and sign classic book instead of card it nice keepsake my other favourite gift from my friends was the baby carrier that we registered for so practical so thoughtful and we ve used it so much from the newborn stage all of the way until now in toddlerhood when my friends have babies ll be getting two gifts the first one will be something off their registry or perhaps gift card to wherever they are registered the next will be little basket of things for the parents including some really good hand cream washing babies washing clothes washing baby dishes washing baby diapers etc my hands were wrecked lol good batch of local coffee healthy snacks they can just grab and eat while up with the baby as well as gift card to close place where they can pick up food real quick im all for eating at home to save money but sometimes you really just can even muster the strength to get to the kitchen to make yourself some food good on you for being so thoughtful bought my friend massage mani pedi just figured moms needs little tlc after the baby comes too for my first asked for loads and loads of nappies and wipes and plain onesies in all sizes the boring stuff diapers in all sizes and wipes will never go unwanted first aid kit sleep machine registry stuff like bottles nipples etc too ended up with way too many clothes people did think it through and got bigger sizes as well but most of the older stuff didn line up with the weather and thus also went unused for real dock tot practically please get them something off their registry that may not seem like fun everyone got me cute towels but for the most part it seemed like people got what they wanted it reached point for me when wondered why even made registry appreciated getting the practical boring stuff off my registry the most wish had gotten few starbucks gift cards didn realize how often my husband would be going there in the early days to get us pick me up at 2pm have to have pack in the change table pack in the diaper bag pack in the kitchen and one in the car otherwise they are never around when need them if she in to waxing get her bikini wax pedicure hair appointment etc something that will make her feel human again and will undoubtedly be on the back burner after baby comes even just bath bomb and face mask you could always include it with little something for baby too definitely look at her registry other than that some things did think of but really liked were these super soft bamboo wash cloths which ended up using for myself as much as for the baby and nipple pads also one of the best things is to be there for her in the first days weeks after birth so grateful for my mom and sister who brought me food several times in the first few weeks and also made target runs for me to pick up nipple shield nipple cream nipple pads basically all the nipple stuff lol we did find out the sex until baby was born largely to avoid this exact problem the only downside is that we got so much yellow there more to neutral than yellow heard so many stories of babies who were newborns and never once got to wear their newborn clothes so specifically asked for 3+ and only had one pack of newborn onesies my family was eager to buy the newborn stuff once baby was born especially since they did know the sex before and were now able to buy bunch of pink crap surprisingly my baby was in newborns for weeks loved the muslin swaddles got and wish had received more but instead had 14 receiving blankets that were too small to really use for swaddling so they were essentially our changing pads and burp cloths for months got 14 receiving blankets and fluffy fleecy soft warm blankets my baby was born in june in san diego nice one handed reusable water bottle or nice cup with straw woukd be great idea too ate ton of hot pockets and smuckers uncrustable sandwiches in the first few weeks too buy all my new parent friends snot sucker it not fun but it useful tell them to put it in drawer until you need it at am usually also get board book but the snot sucker is the key ingredient had very comprehensive but small registry for my baby shower it my second kid but having girl now not boy and trying to replace the things that got destroyed by my son ve already demoted his flannel receiving blankets that were poop and spit up stained to the cleaning rags bucket got literally one thing one thing and it was one of the things at the bottom of the list as far as priority is concerned like could have used new pumping supplies or new bottles or swaddleme wraps that do smell like year old spit up or newborn pacifiers but no nothing but pink clothes that are size months or so freaking impractical that she ll literally never wear it ugh came here to say this maybe add gas drops gripe water and some aquaphor ointment if budget allowed this was the stuff was sorry didn have and went out and bought during those first few months not many of my friends have kids the ones that do bought me what they found useful for their kids they had the best gifts or gift cards for amazon or groceries service or the gift of your time had lot of friends make meals for us which was nice but really wanted more service like offer to come hold the baby for me while take hour nap or take shower or just hold the baby for bit so can eat or wash my dishes for me take out the trash etc or maybe go on walk with me and push the stroller so get out of the house and adult interaction or just come over and have convo with me had section and you can only do so much the first month or so after husband went back to work after taking time off after baby was born was largely alone in the house with the baby and while things around the house piled up sometimes it was just nice having another person hold the baby for 10 minutes while ate meant the world to me wrote out the best gifts got in list baby carrier sling amber necklace punkin butt teething oil nosefrida seems gross but was total life saver muslin blankets onesies 12 months snacks for me to keep near all surfaces that would get stuck breastfeeding because seriously nothing like the ravishing hunger of that first few months whatever you get make sure it not super difficult to return exchange don forget to include that gift receipt obviously hand made it personalized items are the exception here so many of our family members refuse to give us receipts for things they buy our son and it makes me so freaking mad my husband calls me ungrateful but don see it that way personally if bought you gift you didn want rather you be able to return exchange for something you ll use rather than stick it in closet where it waste of your space and my money like others said maybe they got too many clothes in the same size or for seasons that don make sense or want to exchange few of the million receiving blankets sometimes we already have the thing or it thing don want my son to have but we re stuck with it because we don have receipt example we think elf on the shelf is creepy but someone bought him bunch of books and wrote in them so even if we did have receipt we couldn return them grr this advice goes for birthday and christmas gifts as well iirc insurance should cover new pump for each kid could have written the exact same story have so many clothes for this kid more than she can ever wear but need to buy her new baby monitor ohh and the books no more books please yes my husband best friend and wife childfree brought us movie gift card dinner gift card my favorite wine and his favorite smirnoff box of condoms the only requirement for our date was we had to find our own baby sitter also really appreciated the massage was gifted while pregnant know have my script for one just had small manual pump on my registry to help get things started feel kind of bad because only used my nice electric pump about times thanks insurance we were the opposite we had no months clothes we got ton of 24 months clothes though
